text: On the bridge of the Heart of Gold project, because it was clearly in charge.

passages.fragment: On the bridge of the Heart of Gold
passages.source_name: Restaurant At The End Of The Universe
passages.full_quote: <used>On the bridge of the Heart of Gold</used>, all was silent

passages.fragment: the Heart of Gold project , because it was
passages.full_quote: This is why the Imperial Galactic Government chose Damogran for <used>the Heart of Gold project, because it was</used> so deserted and the Heart of Gold was so secret

passages.fragment: , because it was clearly in charge
passages.full_quote: It wasn't actually sitting in a Greek restaurant eating dolmades, but it might as well have been<used>, because it was clearly in charge</used>
